note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Displaylock
tagline: DisplayLock is a simple program that when run attempts to turn off your display and lock your computer.
body:
### The Goal
This simple program was designed because my computer is in the same room where I sleep.  Occasionally, I have need to keep my computer on all night and it's annoying waiting for the display to automatically turn off when I head for bed.  With this program, I simply run it and can rest assured knowing my computer is both locked, and not ruining my sleep by illuminating the room.

### Support or Contact
If you have any trouble or problems or ideas when using DisplayLock, feel free to contact me at john_conder9@mymail.eku.edu and I'll try to get back to you!
